story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_0100:
I hope Silver’s not too bummed about
what happened.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_0200:
Yeah. It seemed like he was really set on
beating Giovanni.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_0300:
It was probably devastating to lose to someone
he really wanted to beat.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_0600:
You’ve got an impressive amount of skill—and at
such a young age.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_0700:
And I can tell your Pokémon has a great deal of
trust in you as a Trainer.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1100:
We wanted to ask you something while Lance and
the others are letting their Pokémon rest up...
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1200:
Why don’t you come with us to battle
Team Rocket?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1300: I already told you... I hate teaming up.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1500:
It’s impossible to fight through life without ever
getting any help, though.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1600:
Just now, you were training with Pryce.
Doesn’t that count as him helping you out?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_1800: Would it be so bad to rely on them?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2000:
You’re rushing things, young man. That’s what I
felt in our battle just now.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2100:
You’re frustrated because the ideal you pursue is
still out of reach, so you’re hungry to overcome
your shortcomings.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2200:
But in order to move forward, aren’t there some
obstacles you can’t overcome alone?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2400: C’mon, Silver! We just wanna help you out!
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2500:
I know you want that one-on-one rematch
with Giovanni...
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2600:
But in order to get to that point, we’ve gotta
battle through the rest of Team Rocket together!
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2700: You don’t know what I’m feeling.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_2800: This is MY problem. Leave me alone.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_3100: Wow, that was kinda pushy, Ethan...
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_3300:
Even though you can’t even tell what’s in
my heart?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_3400:
Yeah. After all, what you feel in your heart are
YOUR feelings!
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_3500:
But I do know that we both wanna take
down Giovanni, right?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_3800:
Even back in Johto, you kept showing up before
me, time and time again... And so many times,
I lost to you.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4000:
You know what? Fine. But only until we get
to Giovanni.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4200:
But don’t you dare interfere in my battle
with him!
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4300: If you do, I won’t hesitate to take you down first.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4600: You’re quite welcome. Stay sharp out there.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4700:
You never know just how long you have until
the friends you’ve shared aspirations with aren’t
around anymore.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4800: What do you mean by that?
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_4900: Oh, just a bit of life advice from an old man.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5000:
As you say, we can’t tell exactly what
others are feeling in their hearts.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5100:
But that’s exactly why it’s a very precious thing to
have friends who care about you and stay by your
side, no matter what.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5300: You never know what could happen. Such is life.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5400:
I hope the connection between you all lasts
for a very long time.
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5600: What?! O-OK, we’ll head back right away!
story_teamrocket_03_03000/2401_1001_5700: Heads up, everyone! Team Rocket is on the move!
